posts.title: JIN TELE - Video streaming web page
posts.body: I built a movie streaming webpage by receiving API from a server called Movie DataBase (https://developers.themoviedb.org/) that provides a movie/TV series datas in many different forms. I received these APIs with Axios and managed them via React-query for this project. Since I prefer to use Typescript, I first entered the data types by analyzing the properties of the API servers. And I built the components including Card, Slider, Footer and Header, and made a total of 12 features using those components. Finally I have built 4 pages on this website, two for the Movie tab and the other 2 for the TV tab. I made those pages utlising the components and features that I made at the beginning and set up page conversions through React-router-dom.

posts.title: Poketex - Pokemon Dictionary
posts.body: I created Pokemon Dictionary by receiving Pokemon APIs from a server (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI) I received these APIs with Axios and managed them via React-query for this project.Since I prefer to use Typescript, I first entered the data types by analyzing the properties of the API servers. And I set up custom hooks that received APIs and array their datas from 4 different aspects. Then I made components that contains UI of how to show each property and feature of Pokemons. At the end, I made 2 pages neatly containing 8 components by using taps and set up page conversions through React-router-dom.

posts.title: Word Chain Game
posts.body: It is a very simple response game. I made setTimeout with random seconds like this. Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) + 2000.

posts.title: Times Table Game
posts.body: sdfsdfsdIt is a quickly built times table game. I randomly generate 2 numbers by Math.ceil(Math.random() * 9) by declaring a very simple method with useState.
